All Implemented Interfaces:

public class CommonBoard
extends javax.swing.JPanel
Board that presents Market and Development Card Grid

    • executeMarketAction

      private void executeMarketAction​(boolean isHorizontal, int index)
      Does all necessary actions to request a market action to the server
      Parameters:
      isHorizontal - Is the request button an horizontal market arrow or a vertical one?
      index - Index of the marketButton

    • executeDevCardPurchase

      private void executeDevCardPurchase​(int row, int col)
      Does all necessary actions to request a Development Card Purchase to the server
      Parameters:
      row - Row on DevCardGrid
      col - Col on DevCardGrid

    • countResources

      private int countResources​(boolean isHorizontal, int index, java.util.Optional<Resource> filter)
      Counts the number of resources in a market strip
      Parameters:
      isHorizontal - Is is an horizontal strip or a vertical one?
      index - Index of the row / col
      filter - Optional resource type, if left empty, it will count every marble that is not Faith
      Returns:
      Count

    • getDiscardedResources

      private java.util.List<Resource> getDiscardedResources​(int row, int col, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> wmsMap)
      Returns a list of discarded resources, retrieved using a JOptionPane dialog
      Parameters:
      row - Market row (-1 if it's a col)
      col - Market column (-1 if it's a row)
      wmsMap - Map of white marble substitution choices
      Returns:
      List of discarded Resources
